alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 10:43PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN ASCENSION, WEST BATON ROUGE, LIVINGSTON, IBERVILLE, WEST CENTRAL TANGIPAHOA, EAST BATON ROUGE AND NORTHWESTERN ASSUMPTION PARISHES THROUGH 1115 PM CST... At 1043 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pride to 7 miles northwest of Bayou Sorrel. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Walker, Addis, Brusly, White Castle, Livingston, Independence, French Settlement, Albany, Rosedale, and Port Vincent. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 134 and 180. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 30. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 38 and 41. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
